backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining Address, Booking, ShipmentDetails, and PincodeCheckResult types with functions to book shipments, track by ID, and retrieve all bookings stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features: removal of PaymentSection component, deletion of PaymentSection.tsx file, and immediate WhatsApp redirect after booking submission.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, hooks, and configuration for the Navixa Express shipment booking application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color system for consistent blue and orange branding.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Navixa Express React application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing modal states for booking and tracking, rendering hero, about, contact, and footer sections with event handlers for CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying company mission, 50+ customers achievement, and three value proposition cards with icons for small business support, customer trust, and fast service.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Dialog modal with shipment booking form collecting sender, receiver, and shipment details that immediately redirects to WhatsApp and closes upon successful submission without showing payment UI.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying clickable cards for phone, WhatsApp, email, and physical address with appropriate icons and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai including UTM tracking parameters based on hostname.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component displaying Navixa Express branding with logo, tagline, and three CTA buttons (Book Shipment, Track Shipment, Contact WhatsApp) over a gradient background with overlay image.
frontend/src/components/TrackShipmentMod: Modal dialog component for tracking shipments by booking ID, displaying booking details including sender/receiver information, shipment status, and formatted timestamps using the useTrackShipment hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingForm.ts: Custom hook managing shipment booking form state (sender, receiver, shipment details), form submission to backend actor, and handling loading/success/error states with form reset functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and providing authentication status states throughout the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackShipment.ts: Custom hook for tracking shipments by booking ID using the backend actor, managing loading/error states and providing tracking data with reset functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color schemes for UI components including primary/secondary colors, borders, backgrounds, and sidebar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space (including blue, orange, sidebar, chart colors), container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for Navixa Express courier/logistics website tracking architectural decisions (modal booking form, WhatsApp integration, blue/orange theme, payment options removed) and existing features including homepage, booking form, pincode validation, and WhatsApp redirect functionality.
